text: Muhammad Niaz is a retired heavyweight freestyle wrestler from Pakistan. ==Career== At the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Niaz won the gold medal alongside another wrestler with the same name Muhammad Niaz-Din. He also participated at the 1962 Asian Games in Jakarta, Indonesia in both freestyle and Greco-Roman styles. He won the Greco-Roman competition but finished third in freestyle. ==References== *UWW Profile Category:Pakistani male sport wrestlers Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for Pakistan Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in wrestling Category:Wrestlers at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Pakistan Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Pakistan Category:Medalists at the 1962 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in wrestling Category:Wrestlers at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Possibly living people Category:Year of birth missing
title: Muhammad Niaz
